short_summary: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has a requirement for one (1) Agricultural Tractor. All the deliverables should be received on or before March 29, 2024.
description: The RCMP has a requirement for one (1) Agricultural Tractor. All the deliverables should be received on or before March 29, 2024.
full_summary:
#Tender Announcement
##Agricultural Tractor Solicitation

###Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number:** 202404255
* **Tender Closing Date:** Tuesday, March 6, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. (EST)
* **Contracting Authority:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Zena Besner
	+ Email: zena.besner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (343) 576-3013

###Notice
The RCMP is soliciting a bid for one (1) Agricultural Tractor.  The tender description is attached to this notice.

###Bidding Information
* **Bidder Eligibility:** This bid solicitation is only open to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A.
* **Tender Method:** Competitive, selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

###Debriefings
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

###Trade Agreements
* **CFTA:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **CCFTA:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* **CCTP:** Canada-Colombia Trade Promotion Agreement
* **CHFTA:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* **CKFTA:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* **CPA:** Canada-Panama Trade Agreement

###Regions of Opportunity
The contract is to be awarded to a supplier based in **Canada**.

###Regions of Delivery
The contract delivery will be to the **National Capital Region (NCR)**.

###Tender Status
* **Status:** Expired
* **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
